raw_mentions:
In some embodiments, the antigen-binding molecule comprising an Fc region as described herein binds to an inhibitory Fcγ receptor (e.g. hFcγRIIb mFcγRIIb) with a K<sub>D </sub>1 nM or greater, preferably one of ≥5 nM, ≥10 nM, ≥50 nM, ≥100 nM, ≥500 nM, ≥1000 nM, a 2000 nM, ≥3000 nM, ≥4000 nM or ≥5000 nM.
In some embodiments, the EC50 (ng/ml) determined for an antigen-binding molecule comprising an Fc region as described herein in an assay of ADCC activity less than 1 times, e.g. less than 0.9, 0.8, 0.7, 0.6, 0.5, 0.4, 0.3, 0.2, or less than 0.1 times the EC50 (ng/ml) determined for an equivalent antigen-binding molecule having an Fc region comprised of CH2-CH3 having the amino acid sequence of SEQ ID NO:174-175.
In some embodiments, the EC50 (ng/ml) for an antigen-binding molecule comprising an Fc region as described herein in an assay of ADCC activity is 500 ng/ml or less, preferably one of ≤400 ng/ml, ≤300 ng/ml, ≤200 ng/ml, ≤100 ng/ml, ≤90 ng/ml, ≤80 ng/ml, ≤70 ng/ml, ≤60 ng/ml, ≤50 ng/ml, ≤40 ng/ml, ≤30 ng/ml, ≤20 ng/ml, or ≤10 ng/ml.

Clone 4-35-B2 was found to bind to human HER3 with an affinity of K<sub>D</sub>=80.9 nM (FIG. 9), and clone 4-35-B4 was found to bind to human HER3 with an affinity of K<sub>D</sub>=50.3 nM (FIG. 10).

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


10D1F.FcA was found inhibit HER2:HER3 dimerisation with greater efficiency than pertuzumab, as reflected by its lower IC50.


Note that there is only one sentence that contains all four required components: a specific molecule name (10D1F.FcA and pertuzumab), a bioactivity metric (IC50), a specific numeric value for that metric (lower, but no exact value is given), and a unit for that value (not explicitly given). However, since the sentence implies a comparison of IC50 values, it can be inferred that the unit is likely to be a concentration unit such as nM or μM, but this is not explicitly stated.


After re-reading the text, I found another sentence that could be relevant:


Cells were then treated with an 8-point serial dilution of 10D1F.FcA or Pertuzumab, starting from 25 μg/ml.


This sentence contains a specific molecule name (10D1F.FcA and Pertuzumab), a numeric value (25), and a unit (μg/ml), but it does not contain a bioactivity metric. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria.


The sentence:


The reaction was stopped with 2M H<sub>2</sub>SO<sub>4</sub>, and OD was measured at 450 nM.


contains a numeric value (450) and a unit (nM), but it does not contain a specific molecule name or a bioactivity metric. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria.


The sentence:


Briefly, cell lines maintained in the indicated cell culture medium, supplemented with 10% FBS and 1% Pen/Strep.


contains a numeric value (10) and a unit (%), but it does not contain a specific molecule name or a bioactivity metric. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria.


The sentence:


Cells were cultured at 37° C., in 5% CO<sub>2 </sub>incubators.


contains a numeric value (5) and a unit (%), but it does not contain a specific molecule name or a bioactivity metric. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria.


The sentence:


500,000 cells were stained in staining buffer containing 0.5% BSA and 2 mM EDTA with primary antibodies (20 μg/ml) for 1.5 h at 4° C.


contains numeric values (0.5, 2, 20) and units (% and μg/ml), but it does not contain a specific molecule name or a bioactivity metric. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria.

10D1F.FcA binds to human HER3 with a high affinity of K<sub>D</sub>=72.6 μM (46A).
10D1F.FcB binds to human HER3 with a high affinity of K<sub>D</sub>=22.2 μM (46B).
